verification.phoneVerificationInstruction: Please check you mobile phone and get the 6-digit verification code
verification.emailVerificationInstruction: Please follow the instruction from the received email to verify your email.

message.verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent to your email address.
message.pleaseCheckYourEmail: Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions in the email to activate your account.
message.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
message.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
message.passwordMustBeBetween: Password must be between {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters.
message.accountNotActivated: This account has not been activated yet.
message.ifYouNotReceiveEmail: If you haven't received the verification email in 10 minutes, you can click the button below to resend the verification email.
message.tooManyRetries: You have entered the invalid email or password too many times. Please try again later.
message.invitationEmail: Enter friend's email to send the invitation.
message.clickingSignupToAgreePolicy: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
message.sendPostCaptureAlert: After this Capture is sent, the ownership will be transferred to the selected friend. Are you sure?
message.transactionExpired: A Capture you sent is returned.
message.syncingAssets: Syncing of your Captures is in progress, this might take a few minutes. Please keep the app open and connected online.
message.allPhotosRegistered: All Captures registered on blockchain successfully
message.confirmPrefetch: Do you want to restore the registered Captures? It may take minutes to complete.
message.doNotTurnOffApp: Please keep the screen on and DO NOT leave the app.
message.confirmDelete: Your local data will be wiped out after deletion. Please double-check that you have created a backup and understand the risk.
message.confirmLogout: Your local data will be wipe out after logout. You can restore your Captures after login again.
message.resetPasswordEnterEmail: To reset the password, you have to enter your registered email.
message.resetPasswordEmailSent: An email has been sent to your registered email inbox. To reset your password, please click the link in the email.
message.videoLimitation: Capture App DOES NOT support video recording longer than 10 secs. Recording longer than 10 secs will not be saved.
message.assetBecomePublicAfterSharing: This asset will become public after sharing
message.assetBecomePublicFor24Hours: Anyone with the link will be able to access the asset in the next 24 hours
message.mintNftAlert: Once the NFT is minted, photo and its information can be accessed publicly. Do you still want to proceed?
message.confirmCopyPrivateKey: Warning: Please do not expose your private key to anyone. Lost of private key may cause your account to be lost permanently.
message.hasListedInCaptureApp: This asset has already been listed in Capture App.
message.notListedInCaptureApp: This asset is not listed in Capture App

error.validationError: Invalid operation. Please check your input again.
error.authenticationError: You have been logged out. Please manually login again.
error.notFoundError: The data cannot be found. Please try again later and make sure you have the permission.
error.serverInternalError: Server internal error. Please try again later.
error.internetError: Internet connection error. Please check your Internet connection quality.
error.timeoutError: Operation timeout. Please try again later.
error.unknownError: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

geolocation.permissionDeniedError: Location permission is denied. Please turn your location permission on to enable the full feature of Capture app.
geolocation.timeoutError: Location collection timeout, possibly due to weak network connectivity or GPS signals.
geolocation.unknownError: Location is not available at this Capture; possibly due to permission error, weak network connectivity or GPS signals.

prefetch.connectError: Photo restore does not complete due to bad network connections. It will continue when you re-open the app next time.

diaBackend.user_is_not_active: Account is not active. Please activate the account from the activation email you received.
diaBackend.external_api_error: An error occurred. Please try again later
diaBackend.phone_verification_code_expired: The verification code has been expired
diaBackend.duplicate_phone_number: The phone number has already been used by another user
diaBackend.user_is_email_verified: The email address has beed verified
diaBackend.user_not_found: There is no account registered with the email address
diaBackend.order_expired: Order expired. Please create a new order and confirm it within 5 minutes.
diaBackend.unable_to_confirm_order: Unable to confirm order. Please try again.
diaBackend.unpaid_num_exceed_threshold: Too much unpaid NUM. Please contact us with email to restore account functionality.
diaBackend.duplicate_email: The email has already been registered
diaBackend.duplicate_username: User with this username already exists
diaBackend.asset_commit_insufficient_fund: Insufficient NUM balance. Please top up your balance to complete the asset registration.

wallets.emptyTransferAmount: Please enter a valid transfer amount.
wallets.noNetworkConnectionCannotRefreshBalance: No internet connection. Cannot refresh balance.
wallets.insufficientFundWithRequiredBalance: Insufficient NUM token. Need at least {{requiredBalance}} NUM.

details.noNetworkConnectionCannotPerformAction: No internet connection. Cannot perform the action.
details.confirmUnpublish: Are you sure you want to Unpublish

error.canNotPerfomEditAction: Temporarily unable to edit. Retry with stable connection or post-asset registration.
error.canNotPerformMintAndShareAction: This asset is minted so that can not perform Mint & Share action
error.canNotPerformOpenNetworkActions: Can not perform open Network Actions page
error.transferOwnershipActionIsUnavailable: Transfer ownership action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.viewOnCaptureClubIsUnavailable: View on CaptureClub action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.viewSupportingVideoOnIpfsIsUnavailable: View supporting video on IPFS action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.deregisterFromNetworkIsUnavailable: Deregister from network action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.mintNftTokenIsUnavailable: Mint NFT token action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.viewAssetProfileIsUnavailable: View asset profile action is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.networkActionsAreUnavailable: Network Actions are unavailable. Please try again later.

saveToDeviceGalleryAlert.messsage: With "Save to Device Gallery", you can specify whether to save all or none of your captured pictures or videos to your device.

requestCameraPermissions.title: Allow camera access in device settings
requestCameraPermissions.explanation: To use the camera, please grant permission for the camera and microphone. The microphone permission is necessary to record videos with sound.

error.duplicateAsset: The asset you are trying to upload already exists on the blockchain. Please try again or contact support.
error.canNotStartCamera: Sorry, we encountered an issue while starting the camera. We apologize for the inconvenience. If the problem persists, please report the issue to our developers through the 'Contact Developers' section on the app's support page. Your feedback will help us improve the app and resolve the issue faster. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
error.fileSizeExeedsLimit: File size exceeds 30MB limit. Please select a smaller file and try again.

wallets.mainnetNumInfo: The amount only supports reflecting your native NUM token currently, if you want to check NUM on ETH or BSC, please copy your asset wallet address and check it on Etherscan or Bscsan.
wallets.myAssetWalletTooltip: Main asset vault for Capture NFT and NUM
wallets.myAssetWalletQRCodeInfo: Please note that only mainnet NUM can be used in Capture App currently, swap your NUM(BSC/ETH) to mainnet NUM before depositing.

buyCredits.inAppProductsNotAvailableYetPleaseTryAga: In App Products are not available yet. Try again later.

settings.pleasePressThePrivateKeyBelowToCopy: Please press the private key below to copy. It is important to keep your private key in a safe place.
settings.iHaveCopiedMyPrivateKey: I have copied my private key

invitation.inviteFriendsBenefit: Get 3 credits for each accepted invitation
invitation.useMyReferralCodeToSignUpForCaptureAppPa: Use my referral code {{referralCode}} to sign up for Capture App, pass verification and we both get NUM Points reward!

slide1.title: Discover
slide1.subtitle: Discover the latest NFTs to be created, sold or shared by your network

createCapturePopUp.title: Create Captures
createCapturePopUp.content: Press the camera button below to create your first Capture. Captures are blockchain photos with a better, open and transparent provenance.

explainExploreTabPopUp.title: Explore Captures!
explainExploreTabPopUp.content: This page shows Captures taken by other creative users. Explore, collect, then Mint and Share your Captures with the world!
